name: Reminder of the Greater Fear
summary: You give a target a stern glower to remind them that it is you, and no one else, they should truly fear.
description:
You give a target a stern glower to remind them that it is you, and no one else, they should truly fear. Reduce the value of the frightened condition the creature would take by 1.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.

Vigilante: Using actions and abilities with the vigilante trait while in your social identity risks exposing you as a vigilante.
trigger: Another creature within 30 feet of you that can see you would gain the frightened condition.
